abstract: In the baseball playoffs, memorable characters include Nyjer Morgan, Matt Treanor, Yorvit Torrealba, and a tribute to the Cardinals that seems somewhat creepy.

headline.main: Backup Catchers, a Scary Fountain, and the Story of Tony Plush
